name: ConnectedLiving
0:
”Alexa, ask Connected Living what are the events tonight”
”Alexa, ask Connected Living what's for dinner”
”Alexa, ask Connected Living are there any community announcements”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: connected living
des:
Connected Living provides residents and families of Senior Living communities the ability to stay connected to all of the important things going on at the community - such as daily events, dining options, alerts, and community announcements.

In order to use this skill, you need to FIRST register Alexa with your Community and program level.

An example registration process is: “Alexa, ask Connected Living to register me for Crown Colony, Assisted Living."

**Please Note: Every community has its own registration name. This registration name is provided to you by your community.**

After using a few simple steps to connect Alexa to your community, just say commands like:

"Alexa, ask Connected Living what are the events tonight"?
"Alexa, ask Connected Living whats for dinner"?
"Alexa, ask Connected Living are there any community announcements"?

Happy Connecting!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
